data.comment: Livio Marinelli starts the match. Napoli with the kick-off in Crotone.
In Crotone Napoli attack through Andrea Petagna. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 1, Livio Marinelli awards Crotone a goal kick.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Napoli to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
In the minute 5, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Crotone are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
In the minute 7, Crotone have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Livio Marinelli signals a Crotone throw-in in Napoli's half.
In the minute 10, Napoli drives forward and Lorenzo Insigne gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
Napoli have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Ahmad Benali (Crotone) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Crotone.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Napoli.
In the minute 13, Livio Marinelli signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Crotone's area.
Throw-in Napoli.
Crotone's Junior Messias breaks free at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
Livio Marinelli awards the home team a throw-in.
Andrea Petagna for Napoli drives towards goal at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Crotone needs to be cautious. Napoli have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Simeon Nwankwo (Crotone) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Napoli at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Arkadiusz Reca for Crotone who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Crotone's Arkadiusz Reca looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 31, Lorenzo Insigne puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Piotr Zielinski to set up the goal.
In the minute 33, Napoli have a goal kick.
Free kick Crotone.
Simeon Nwankwo (Crotone) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
Crotone have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Milos Vulic is replacing Ahmad Benali for the home team.
Crotone's Milos Vulic is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Crotone capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Napoli's half?
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Napoli.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 39, Livio Marinelli signals a Crotone throw-in in Napoli's half.
Livio Marinelli awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 44, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crotone will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Napoli.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Giuseppe Cuomo for Crotone has been booked by Livio Marinelli and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Crotone - Crotone with the kick-off.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 48, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Stadio Ezio Scida has been interrupted briefly for a check on Diego Demme, who is down injured.
Jacopo Petriccione Crotone.
In the minute 51, Lorenzo Insigne for the away team is judged to be offside.
Diego Demme returns to the field for Napoli after picking up a slight injury.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Pedro Pereira (Crotone) has received a yellow card from Livio Marinelli.
Throw-in high up the field for Napoli in Crotone.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Napoli.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 57, In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Napoli take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Hirving Lozano.
Lorenzo Insigne with an assist there.
In the minute 62, Napoli drive upfield and Lorenzo Insigne gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Piotr Zielinski of Napoli gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
In the minute 63, Free kick Napoli.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Napoli.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
In the minute 67, Free kick in a good position for Napoli!
Crotone's Arkadiusz Reca has been booked in Crotone.
Napoli are coming forward and Mario Rui gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 68, Livio Marinelli awards Crotone a goal kick.
Crotone's Junior Messias misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Napoli at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Piotr Zielinski with Dries Mertens.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Crotone.
Napoli's Kalidou Koulibaly gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Livio Marinelli signals a Napoli throw-in in Crotone's half.
In the minute 76, Goal! Napoli extend their lead to 0-3 through Diego Demme.
That's a fine assist from Dries Mertens.
Gennaro Gattuso (Napoli) is making a second substitution, with Matteo Politano replacing Hirving Lozano.
In the minute 78, Napoli make their third substitution with Stanislav Lobotka replacing Tiemoue Bakayoko.
The away team have replaced Lorenzo Insigne with Eljif Elmas. This is the fourth substitution made today by Gennaro Gattuso.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 81, Stanislav Lobotka is booked for the away team.
Throw-in Crotone.
Nikola Maksimovic is replacing Kalidou Koulibaly for Napoli at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 84, Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
At Stadio Ezio Scida, Matteo Politano has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Dries Mertens for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
In the minute 86, Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Giovanni Stroppa is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Ezio Scida with Denis Dragus replacing Simeon Nwankwo.
Giovanni Stroppa is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Ezio Scida with Eduardo Henrique replacing Pedro Pereira.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Crotone.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Napoli close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
The match is over. Final score 0-4.
Andrea Petagna puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-4.
Dries Mertens instrumental with a fine assist.
